response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the ham hocks from the fridge. The robot now has the ham hocks in its inventory. The next subtask is to put the ham hocks in the stockpot.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the ham hocks from the fridge
(3) Put the ham hocks in the stockpot
(4) Cook the ham hocks in the stockpot
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Put the ham hocks in the stockpot
    stockpot = registry(env, "stockpot_81")
    ham_hock = registry(env, "ham_hock_82")
    put_ontop(robot, ham_hock, stockpot)
    donothing(env)
